# x

**Instance Property**

The index of the tile along the x-axis of the map.

## Declaration

```swift
var x: Int
```

## Instance properties

- **y**: The index of the tile along the y-axis of the map.
- **z**: The index of the tile along the z-axis of the map.
- **contentScaleFactor**: The tile’s intended screen scale factor.
